pull.title: lint: Add linter for circular dependencies
pull.body:
Protects against added circular depencies, makes it explicit in the
code when circular dependencies have been removed.

Modeled after EXPECTED_BOOST_INCLUDES in lint-includes.sh

Example output:
```
$ test/lint/lint-circular-dependencies.sh 
A new circular dependency in the form of "qt/paymentserver -> qt/walletmodel -> qt/paymentserver" appears to have been introduced.

$ echo $?
1
$ test/lint/lint-circular-dependencies.sh 
Good job! The circular dependency "Fake" is no longer present.
Please remove it from EXPECTED_CIRCULAR_DEPENDENCIES in test/lint/lint-circular-dependencies.sh
to make sure this circular dependency is not accidentally reintroduced.

$ echo $?
1
$ test/lint/lint-circular-dependencies.sh 
$ echo $?
0

```

events.body: Fixed inconsistent trailing space between cases.

Very very nice! This will help us get rid of circular dependencies permanently! Thanks for doing this.

ACK 54f16f23e886f6c37189aa53c86cdb0cefa809ea modulo nits

events.message:
lint: Add linter for circular dependencies

Protects against added circular depencies, makes it explicit in the
code when circular dependencies have been removed.

Modeled after EXPECTED_BOOST_INCLUDES in lint-includes.sh

issue.title: [refactor] Fix the chainparamsbase -> util circular dependency
issue.body:
By moving gArgs references out of chainparamsbase.cpp.

Note both chainparams.cpp, bitcoin-cli.cpp, and all callers of
SetupChainParamsBaseOptions include util.h

issue.title: commits from bitcoin/master
issue.body:
tests: fixes mininode's P2PConnection sending messages on closing transport
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13715

depends: disable Werror when building zmq
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13689

[trivial] Correct help text for `importaddress` RPC
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13074

wallet: Fix non-determinism in ParseHDKeypath(...). Avoid using an uninitialized variable in path calculation.
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13712

Add createwallet "disableprivatekeys" option: a sane mode for watchonly-wallets
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9662

docs: Specify preferred Python string formatting technique
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13718

p2p: Remove dead service bits code
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11637

lint: Add linter for circular dependencies
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13695

Remove boost::program_options dependency
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13482

Fix bitcoin-cli --version
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13725

Utils and libraries: Removes the boost/algorithm/string/join dependency
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13726

wallet: Introduce assertion to document the assumption that cache and cache_used are always set in tandem
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13683

trivial: Replace CPubKey::operator[] with CPubKey::vch where possible
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13722

Remove redundant variables, statements and forward declarations
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13691

doc: Remove field in getblocktemplate help that has never been used.
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12764

Avoid locking mutexes that are already held by the same thread
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11762

Utils: Refactor ArgsManager a little
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13733

Drop dead code from Stacks
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13633

Net: Fixed a race condition when disabling the network.
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13212

trivial: remove unneeded include
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13740

Avoid creating a temporary vector for size-prefixed elements
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13719

tests: Skip P2PConnection's is_closing() check when not available
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13747

@@ -0,0 +1,85 @@
+#!/usr/bin/env bash
+#
+# Copyright (c) 2018 The Bitcoin Core developers
+# Distributed under the MIT software license, see the accompanying
+# file COPYING or http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php.
+#
+# Make sure only lowercase alphanumerics (a-z0-9), underscores (_),
+# hyphens (-) and dots (.) are used in source code filenames.
+
+export LC_ALL=C
+
+EXPECTED_CIRCULAR_DEPENDENCIES=(
+    "chainparamsbase -> util -> chainparamsbase"
+    "checkpoints -> validation -> checkpoints"
+    "index/txindex -> validation -> index/txindex"
+    "policy/fees -> txmempool -> policy/fees"
+    "policy/policy -> validation -> policy/policy"
+    "qt/addresstablemodel -> qt/walletmodel -> qt/addresstablemodel"
+    "qt/bantablemodel -> qt/clientmodel -> qt/bantablemodel"
+    "qt/bitcoingui -> qt/utilitydialog -> qt/bitcoingui"
+    "qt/bitcoingui -> qt/walletframe -> qt/bitcoingui"
+    "qt/bitcoingui -> qt/walletview -> qt/bitcoingui"
+    "qt/clientmodel -> qt/peertablemodel -> qt/clientmodel"
+    "qt/paymentserver -> qt/walletmodel -> qt/paymentserver"
+    "qt/recentrequeststablemodel -> qt/walletmodel -> qt/recentrequeststablemodel"
+    "qt/sendcoinsdialog -> qt/walletmodel -> qt/sendcoinsdialog"
+    "qt/transactiontablemodel -> qt/walletmodel -> qt/transactiontablemodel"
+    "qt/walletmodel -> qt/walletmodeltransaction -> qt/walletmodel"
+    "rpc/rawtransaction -> wallet/rpcwallet -> rpc/rawtransaction"
+    "txmempool -> validation -> txmempool"
+    "validation -> validationinterface -> validation"
+    "wallet/coincontrol -> wallet/wallet -> wallet/coincontrol"
+    "wallet/fees -> wallet/wallet -> wallet/fees"
+    "wallet/rpcwallet -> wallet/wallet -> wallet/rpcwallet"
+    "wallet/wallet -> wallet/walletdb -> wallet/wallet"
+    "policy/fees -> policy/policy -> validation -> policy/fees"
comments.body: Nit: Please sort these entries to make it easy to find a specific circular dependency in the list.

comments.body: These are sorted consistent with the output of `contrib/devtools/circular-dependencies.py`, which is deterministic. https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13228#issuecomment-389701793
